topic.title: Food Preference Food Item - conformance rules

section.p: A record of a food preference item and the quantity in which it is ordered.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] foodPreferenceItem with data type Code
An item that is requested as part of a Food Preference order.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quanity with data type Integer Ratio
The ordered quantity of the requested food item.

Contains exactly one [1..1] foodPreferenceItem with data type Code
An item that is requested as part of a Food Preference order.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quanity with data type Integer Ratio
The ordered quantity of the requested food item.
